title: Everything about DJ SONA - skins, music, special features.. Enjoy

replies.body:
Concussive is fking badass!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7BfXn4OXdA

I love concussive!

But you could change skins with the phase of the game;
Early Game - Ethereal 
Mid - Kinetic
Late - Concussive
You seem like a fun person to play with. If you want add Scholtex in client.
Shot you an add :D!
Awesome. I'll accept it once I get home from work...in about 8 more hours....AHAHHHA
I'm "working from home" today.
The music is really good, i've been listening to the tracks thru my sennheiser headphones.. bliss
;( if only some could afford such beauties.........{{item:3070}}

ignore my previous post, I can see the good in her dance

https://31.media.tumblr.com/7558bef8f515fc1fb0933db9c8b79c50/tumblr_inline_nj7zczCFk41r85o8p.gif

My boyfriend is going to lose his mind!
{{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}}
Lose his mind over the skin or when you buy it for him?

Hahaha when he saw it (cause he's seen it and promptly lost his mind)!
We're both buying it!
Can't wait to get this skinnnnn{{champion:37}}
That moment when you decide to become a Sona main. {{champion:37}}
I know there is already a new skin for Sona but wouldn't it be cool if there was a Kitty Cat Sona skin, so it would look like a cat playing a piano.
I can guarantee you i will buy this skin the instant it comes out. Even if i don't own Sona or have never played her in my life; I'll learn how to main a Support champ and play her all the time :D

Sounds like Riot had loads of fun making this one. Very Euro sounding, and I love it!

Also can't help but notice the design similarites to Pulsfire Ezreal. Maybe he's a fan of Sona's music and listens to it in the suit? Or sheer coincidence? Personally I think it's the former. :3

I'm trying to get the music to download. I hit the download button and not much happens....anyone else having issues?
love the music...just want it for the Pod
They should make a new Mordekaiser and Taric skin and update Poppy's, Swain's, Evelynn's. Taric's and Nidalee's splash art. Riot please.
Ethereal
Looks nice this skin, Miku Hatsune is awesome!
Thank god you can opt out of her music, that sh*t would've gotten annoying real fast.

Yeah it's just a shame that they nerfed her like 3 patches in a row for no real reason so now she is just even lower compared to the Leona/Thresh/Braum bar I doubt anyone but legitimate Sona mains can play her well now.

Abit like this you reckon?


http://puu.sh/eZjSV/a98387ce91.png
What is the release date on this skin btw?{{champion:37}}
I wantttttt but its gonna be so costly and I don't play Sona :(
It reminds me of a nokia game the music needs to be more modern one drance one dubstep one hardstyle ... the artwork is really nice though...
Its pretty modern, but everyone's entitled to their opinion.
Is anyone else offering their partners a little somethingsomething for them to get you the skin? ;)
I'm offering myself to buy it on 3 accounts or 4 accounts.

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jpnddQqr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-04T00:28:31.031+0000)
>
> I'm offering myself to buy it on 3 accounts or 4 accounts.

Me... Senpai? :C
But I'm selfish. I'm only buying for myself.

>
> But I'm selfish. I'm only buying for myself.

Plot twist, i'm your mental state.. Your sanity
I'd buy it, if only it didn't have that dance.
